total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the coordinates of the two different numbers in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the direction from the first number to the second number.
Q3: Draw a line of the first number from its position to the position of the second number.
Q4: Draw a line of the second number perpendicular to the first line, starting from its position and extending in both directions.
Q5: Identify the position of the third number in the input grid.
Q6: Draw a line of the first number from the position of the third number to the line of the second number.
Q7: Draw a line of the second number perpendicular to the line drawn in Q6, starting from the position of the third number and extending in both directions.
Q8: Fill the remaining cells with 0.
